feedback.title: Encourage Deeper Concept Linking
feedback.why: Knowledge construction score is low, meaning teacher and student dialogue didn’t go deep enough.
how: Prompt students with open-ended ‘why’ or ‘how’ questions.
Ask follow-ups that connect current discussion to prior knowledge.

feedback.title: Increase Student Talk Ratio
feedback.why: Students spoke less than 25% of the total discourse.
how: Ask for multiple viewpoints before summarizing yourself.
Give students short prompts to summarize what was discussed.

feedback.title: Promote Level-5 Discourse
feedback.why: Very few moments reached evaluative or reflective discourse (Level 5).
how: Ask learners to critique an idea or offer alternative perspectives.
Use metacognitive questions like ‘What led you to that conclusion?’
Encourage summarizing and contrasting multiple solutions.
